root.name: HIND: The Russian Combat Helicopter Simulation
root.description: Hind is a realistic helicopter combat simulator released in 1996 featuring the Soviet Mi-24 Hind helicopter gunship, named "The Bogeyman" by Nato pilots. The Hind is a two-seat helicopter with a crew consisting of a pilot and a gunnery officer. The game also has a multiplayer mode where two players can be seated in the same helicopter occupying these different positions, up to a 16 player network within.Despite being a simulator it also has options for arcade gameplay.
